title: Blockchain Association challenges Sen. Warren’s crypto hiring criticism
description:
CEO Kristin Smith said that the Blockchain Association is proud to count many former military, national security, intelligence officers, and law enforcement professionals among its staff.

Blockchain Association, a major nonprofit organization that supports digital asset economy and environment, has responded to Senator Elizabeth Warren’s criticism of government-related hires in the crypto industry.

On Jan. 9, Blockchain Association CEO Kristin Smith published an open letter addressed to Sen. Warren, urging her to collaborate on issues like the involvement of government officials in the industry.

On behalf of the Blockchain Association, Smith offered the organization’s partnership to work with Sen. Warren on the issues she raised in a letter on Dec. 18, 2023.

Read more

title: This Bitcoin ’bull cross’ is about to hit for the first time since 2016
description:
Bitcoin is attempting to print a rare crossover that preceded the BTC price bull run to $20,000 in 2017.

Bitcoin (BTC) is preparing to repeat a rare bullish chart move absent for the past eight years.

In a post on X (formerly Twitter) on Jan. 9, the popular commentator known as Moustache revealed a key BTC price moving average crossover in the making.

Bitcoin is back near $50,000 as the crypto market renaissance continues.

Read more
